attributes.additional_details:
Our primary targets:
Stop the brexit negotiations and have a second referendum.
Make the minimum voting age 16.
Make the maximum voting age 64.
Let the general public have more of a say in votes that concern them.
Make the majority of money from taxes go to things like police, schools and homeless shelters instead of the majority going to employees on benefits.

We will have more ideas in the future so sign this petition and support the scataborists.
Vote Scataborists today! Rest easy tomorrow.
attributes.background: Our country has been failing in things like brexit and other issues. We need a new, strong party to help fix these mistakes. Our party is called the scataborists and is led by e scataboro who is the creator of the party.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting up new political parties.
